#summary Overview of the Server class
#labels Phase-Implementation,Featured

= Introduction =

The Server class can be used to serve file over a standard HTTP connection.

= Details =

This class provide a basic web server for the Plug-in to work with. A local server provides a way to circumvent all access issues between JavaScript and the local file system by serving the local files over a standard TCP connection.

The server itself supports a limited number of file / Content-types (MIME types), these are;

* .txt text/plain
* .htm text/html
* .kml application/vnd.google-earth.kml+xml
* .kmz application/vnd.google-earth.kmz
* .jpg image/jpeg
* .png image/png
* .gif image/gif
 
The server uses version 1.1 of HTTP.

By default it only accepts connections from GoogleEarth User-agents on the same machine.

== Constructor == 

_HttpServer.Server_ *Server()*<br>
Initializes a new instance of the Server class

_HttpServer.Server_ *Server(System.string rootDirectory)*<br>
Initializes a new instance of the Server class

_HttpServer.Server_ *Server(System.string rootDirectory, System.string defaultFileName)*<br>
Initializes a new instance of the Server class

== Public Properties ==

_System.String_ *DefaultFileName*<br>
Gets or sets the default file name<br>
The default value is "default.kml"<br>

_System.Net.IPAddress_ *IPAddress*<br>
Gets or sets the IP Address for the server to use<br>
The default is 127.0.0.1 (localhost/loopback)<br>

_System.Int_ *Port*<br>
Gets or sets the port for the server to use 
The default value is 8080

_System.String_  *RootDirectory*<br>
Gets or sets the root server directory (webroot)<br>
The default value is "\" (the application root)
http://localhost:port/ will point to this directory<br>

== Public methods ==

_Void_ *Start()*<br>
Starts the server

_Void_ *Stop()*<br>
Stops the server
